title: 13 min waiting for a flex queue and then this.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/06ab789a824b66982339570a3b4c0da1.png

I can't wait to see what toxic things I did this time. I wonder if it was the Akali game where the ADC spent 90% of the game stealing my CS and then I got reported for asking him to be reported. Maybe it was the Lux game where Zed stole my lane and then refused to leave. Or, just maybe, it was the LeBlanc game where my lane was once again stolen by a duo and I was made to be the bad guy.

I'm so excited, like a small child on Christmas morning, to see what I did wrong this time. At least now I can buy Viktor! Haha thanks, Riot!

replies.body:
Third Reich: I'm highe rup on the list
Mid player: no man
Mid player: im mid bro

Legit Question: Were you trying to claim 'pick order' to get mid off a player who got that role using Role Select?

> [{quoted}](name=Somebody not you,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uwFI6GF5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T21:37:41.826+0000)
>
> Third Reich: I'm highe rup on the list
> Mid player: no man
> Mid player: im mid bro
> 
> Legit Question: Were you trying to claim 'pick order' to get mid off a player who got that role using Role Select?

He knew I was joking. Considering I was excited to try Viktor support just a few posts up from that.

Then I realised I didn't own Viktor.

ROFL
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I've done that... gone into a match premade with mates, had a game plan all worked out, knew what we were going to play and why and how and then get into lobby and realise I'm on a smurf and don't actually own the champ I wanted to play that was key to the entire set up and it's like...

Fuck.

/dodge

> [{quoted}](name=Somebody not you,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uwFI6GF5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T22:21:11.566+0000)
>
> ROFL
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
> 
> I've done that... gone into a match premade with mates, had a game plan all worked out, knew what we were going to play and why and how and then get into lobby and realise I'm on a smurf and don't actually own the champ I wanted to play that was key to the entire set up and it's like...
> 
> Fuck.
> 
> /dodge

I was so excited because I tried it ages ago and it's actually OP. Feelsbad. Oh well, 13 days until I can collect freelo :D
You only have one account? Pffft you're an amateur ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uwFI6GF5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-16T02:45:16.487+0000)
>
> Good to see you're excited ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

I stopped getting upset or nervous about it after last time. I just have this feeling every game that someone will get triggered at what I do and I'll get reported. Best thing would to be silent, but then I'd get reported for not communicating.
maybe it was all that shit. who knows...

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uwFI6GF5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-16T02:53:04.336+0000)
>
> maybe it was all that shit. who knows...

All of it combined! Oh my!

This would've been avoided if Riot did what I asked.
